typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Category as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src_cncstatus
src_cncstatus sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'dtmi_jabil_hackathon_cnc_status-1.cdm.json',
	format: 'cdm',
	corpusPath: 'jabilcdm',
	folderPath: 'jabilcdm/dtmi_jabil_hackathon_cnc_status-1',
	fileSystem: 'cdm',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'cdm',
	mapColumn(
		{$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		SequentialNumber,
		EMT,
		CreateTime,
		Status,
		ErrorCode,
		TotalNum,
		Category,
		EventTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> loadcncstatus
